title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 262.211 - Requirement for notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 262.211 - Requirement for notice

State Regulations

Before performing an alcohol test under this Part, each
operator shall notify a covered employee that the alcohol test is required by
this Part. No operator shall falsely represent that a test is administered
under this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
262.211

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
